contentList.content: You are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Necrotic damage and non-magical Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage, taking only half damage from them.
The vampire ascendant regains [1] at the start of its turn.
Sink your fangs into a living creature and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HP_REDUCTION_VAMPIRE">Sap</LSTag> its blood.
Regain [1] at the start of your turn.
Behold, the Vampire Ascendant! Thousands of souls have bought you power, granting you fearsome vampiric powers and absolving you of its weaknesses.
